q: Charlotte. The 49ers neutralized Tu Holloway , a player of the year candidate, and handed the Musketeers their first A-10 loss, 66-62. Tu Holloway missed all eight of his three-point tries and went 3 of 17 overall. It's like in football if you're playing Michael Vick , 49ers coach Alan Major told the Charlotte Observer. "You'd rather Michael Vick throw it than run. We'd rather have[ Tu Holloway ] shooting over you rather than driving around you." 9

Chrysler Canada, which owes about$ 1.7 billion to the federal and Ontario governments, says it is the first time that the company is voluntarily paying extra money to workers beyond contractual obligations. It's in recognition of an extraordinary performance of the industrial system of Chrysler in 2010, chief executive officer Sergio Marchionne told analysts after U.S. parent Chrysler reported its year-end results.
